message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation that will affect you more.
Let's be reasonable. I'll take 70% and you get 30%.  We both need to compromise to get something before the money depreciates further.
Let's split it evenly. We both lose money with every round, so a 50/50 split seems like the best option for both of us.
